function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of novel and creative applications of digital technologies in pandemic control","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Grounded from 212 cases which applied 5g to combat against the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of theoretical insights on the role of 5g in pandemic prevention and control","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Automation and use of driverless vehicles and robots may lead to a reduction in the availability of human resources for pandemic prevention and control.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate attention to 5g’s social and business values due to focus on technological aspects and lack of commercial usage.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health impact during lockdown","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity of social systems making lockdown implementation difficult","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misinformation about the role of 5g in covid-19 prevention and control.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g technology may lead to neglect of other important preventive measures.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited accessibility to 5g technology may exacerbate existing health disparities.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interdisciplinary approach and investigation needed","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centrality of welfare and housing policies in population well-being","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration in studying and addressing covid-19 epidemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contradictory evidence on the relationship between human density and infection severity may lead to misinterpretation and mismanagement of pandemic control measures","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of epidemic in densely populated and well-connected areas","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Critical factors such as population density and travel history contributing to the spread of covid-19","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The characteristics of urban design and transportation can affect pandemic dynamics, with contradictory evidence on the relationship between density and infection outbreaks.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The rate of people coming from highly populated areas and the density of population areas are critical factors in understanding the spread rates of covid-19, with contradictory evidence on the relationship between density and infection prevalence.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population density leads to higher transmission rates of contagious diseases such as covid-19.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reluctance of the real estate industry to invest in future-proofed buildings with reduced lifetime costs.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The relationship between population density and the spread of covid-19
